document_data.caption: A salmon found in the Shaengarne River.

document_data.mainbody: '''Salmon''', also known as '''sorn''', was a common species of [[fish]] found throughout Realms.{{Cite dragon/277/The New Adventures of Volo: Dragonwing Stew|93}} Acting as a food source for many [[beast]]s, [[humanoid]]s, and other creatures.
document_data.Description: The various species of salmon had different hues to their scales, with silver being more common in the [[Moonshae Isles]].
document_data.Behavior: Salmon were known for returning to their spawning grounds in cold mountain rivers every spring to procreate and lay roe, giving birth to future generations of the fish.

Ecology.Species: *Shaengarne salmon: This species of salmon traveled to the Shaengarne River every spring to their sprawling ground.
Ecology.Uses:
[[File:Salmon en Croûte.png|thumb|''Salmon en Croûte.'']]
*[[Clothing]]: [[Korobokuru]] dwarves in Kara-Tur often weaved cloth out of [[hemp (plant)|hemp nettle]], bark, fur, feathers, and salmon skin.
*[[Deviled eggs|Deviled]] [[spices|spice]]-and-salmon [[duck]] [[egg]]s: A famous delicacy from the [[Cold Duck]] eatery in [[Beluir]].
*[[Marsemban tart]]s: Delicious pastries topped with [[parsley]], [[potato]], diced salmon, [[crab]], and smothered in [[almond]] [[milk]], [[wine]], [[leek]], and [[persimmon]]s.
*Silky salmon and [[prawn]] [[tart]]s were one of the specialties of the [[Oak-Father's Boon]] inn in [[Mosstone]] of [[Tethyr]].
*[[Salmon cream]]: A traditional accompaniment for [[brassla]] made out of dried and crushed salmon.
*[[Salmon en Croûte]]: A salmon dish from the [[Sword Coast]] that consisted of a fresh fish, wrapped in pastry crust and drizzled with a hearty [[buttter]] sauce.
*Salmon, steamed with [[shallot]] and wine cream: A local specialty in [[Fireshear]], [[Frozenfar]].
*[[Salted fish]]: Salmon was among the fish that were caught in the Lake of Mists by the people of the Endless Wastes.
* Smoked salmon: A popular delicacy exported from the island of Gundarlun. It could often be found in [[Waterdeep]]'s fancy establishments and served as an appetizer at various social events there, or eaten for a fine breakfast in [[Cormyr]].<ref> Smoking salmon was also a common preservation technique among the residents of the [[Endless Wastes]].

document_data.History:
In the days of ancient [[Netheril]], salmon was commonly found in the [[Allegro River]], [[Annagoth Bay]], and [[Fria River]].

In [[1358 DR]], during the [[Time of Troubles]], the river of the [[Winding Water]] became corrupted, oily, and poisonous following the death of [[Bhaal]]. The river had been a habitat of salmon and, following the disaster, the population of the fish was decimated.

In [[1364 DR]], delectable imported smoked salmon was served at an event hosted by [[Lucia Thione-Hhune]], held in the ballroom of her [[Sea Ward]] villa in Waterdeep.

In [[1372 DR]], a serving of bad salmon was blamed for the death of a nobleman from [[Daggerford]], [[Elveronne Bricket]]. In reality, salmon was innocent and his murderous poisoner sister [[Muriel Bricket]] was to blame.
document_data.Trivia:
*[[Baraundarella]] was a voluptuous dancer who was unkindly called Salmon-Ella, for her fishnets that reminded some of fish in nets.{{Cite dragon/402/The Rise of Bardic Beauty|9}}.
*The [[green elf|green elves]] used images of various animals as tattoos, representing individual's spirit animal. Salmon were one among their designs.
*The [[Silver Salmon]] was a hospitable inn in [[Corwell]] on the Moonshae Isles, named after the common salmon found throughout the isles.
